Row.Text: By turning the City into a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Puppet[ENDCOLOR], it will generate Gold, Science, Culture, etc. for you, but you [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]may not choose what it produces[ENDCOLOR] or customize the City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It will contribute much less [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] than an Annexed City, and will not increase the cost of your Social Policies and Great People. It will also have increased base [ICON_JFD_BLUE_FIST] Loyalty. If you choose this, you may later Annex the City at any point.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Puppeting this City will increase [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness by {1_Num}.

Click to move {1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} to a new location.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When a spy is directed to move to a new city, it takes a number of turns before it becomes fully effective.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If the spy is moving to its owner's city, it will begin counter-espionage to uncover and kill enemy spies. It will also increase [ICON_JFD_BLUE_FIST] Loyalty.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If a spy is moved to a city that is owned by a another civilization, the spy will begin trying to steal a technology from that civilization. A spy can only steal from a civilization that knows any technology that the spy's owner does not. If the owner of the city has a spy defending the city, your spy has a chance of being discovered and killed. This may strain diplomatic relations![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If the spy moves to a city that is a City-State, the spy will attempt to rig the elections to increase your influence over the city-state.
City is considered {1_LoyaltyDesc}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]City will revolt/rebel in {2_Num} Turn(s)![ENDCOLOR]
City is considered {1_LoyaltyDesc}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]City will celebrate in {2_Num} Turn(s)![ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_JFD_BLUE_FIST] Loyalty determines a city's compliance to your empire. High Loyalty may result in a [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day,' but low Loyalty may cause the city to [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt - to spawn Rebels or even to defect from the empire![NEWLINE]{1_LoyaltySources}[NEWLINE]*These modifiers scale with [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE]{3_LoyaltyColour}{4_Num}% {2_IconString} Loyalty Total[ENDCOLOR]

City will [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt in {1_Num} Turn(s)![NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FADING_NEGATIVE_TEXT]This will cause the city to spawn rebels![ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT][ICON_JFD_REVOLT] REVOLT Sentiment: {2_Num}/{3_Num} ({4_Num})[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT][ICON_JFD_WLTKD] WLTKD Sentiment: {5_Num}/{6_Num} ({7_Num})[ENDCOLOR]

City will [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt in {1_Num} Turn(s)![NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FADING_NEGATIVE_TEXT]This will cause the city to defect![ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT][ICON_JFD_REVOLT] REVOLT Sentiment: {2_Num}/{3_Num} ({4_Num})[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT][ICON_JFD_WLTKD] WLTKD Sentiment: {5_Num}/{6_Num} ({7_Num})[ENDCOLOR]

City will begin celebrating a [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' in {1_Num} Turn(s)![NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT][ICON_JFD_REVOLT] REVOLT Sentiment: {2_Num}/{3_Num} ({4_Num})[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT][ICON_JFD_WLTKD] WLTKD Sentiment: {5_Num}/{6_Num} ({7_Num})[ENDCOLOR]
{1_CityName} has revolted because their [ICON_JFD_RED_FIST] Disloyalty remains too high!
A [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt is expected to break out in {1_CityName} in {2_Num} turns if we do not address the city's [ICON_JFD_RED_FIST] Disloyalty!
{1_CityName} has revolted from the {2_CivName} and declared independence!
{1_CityName} has begun celebrating a [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' because their [ICON_JFD_BLUE_FIST] Loyalty remains high!
'We Love the King Day' Imminent in {1_CityName}!
A [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' celebration is expected to begin in {1_CityName} in {2_Num} turns if we can maintain their [ICON_JFD_BLUE_FIST] Loyalty!
{1_CityName} has become [COLOR_LOYALTY_JFD_NEUTRAL]Neutral[ENDCOLOR] toward their being in your civilization.
{1_CityName} has become [COLOR_LOYALTY_JFD_PATRIOTIC]Patriotic[ENDCOLOR]. A patriotic city may begin celebrating a [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day.'
{1_CityName} has become [COLOR_LOYALTY_JFD_ALLEGIANT]Allegiant[ENDCOLOR]. An allegiant city may begin celebrating a [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day.'
{1_CityName} has become [COLOR_LOYALTY_JFD_REBELLIOUS]Rebellious[ENDCOLOR]. A rebellious city is at risk of spawning Rebels!
{1_CityName} has become [COLOR_LOYALTY_JFD_SEPARATIST]Separatist[ENDCOLOR]. A separatist city is at risk of defecting!
